alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 6:43PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Hamilton, western Fulton, southern Herkimer and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 730 PM EST... At 642 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Oriskany to near Otselic. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Newport, Middleville, Poland and Cold Brook around 655 PM EST. Ohio around 700 PM EST. West Winfield and Cedarville around 705 PM EST. Mohawk and Jordanville around 710 PM EST. Little Falls and Lake Pleasant around 720 PM EST. Speculator, Fort Plain, St. Johnsville, Wells, Moffitt Beach Campground and Sacandaga Campground around 725 PM EST. Ephratah, Caroga Lake Public Campground and Caroga Lake around 730 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Ingham Mills, Girards Sugarbush, Spinnerville, Cedar Lake, Farrel Corner, Countryman, Whitehouse, South Ilion, Mindenville and Kelhi Corners. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 29A and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer
